评论概述: CUTE but thin and scant in the bust
评论详情: This is a CUTE top, but it's not going to work for everybody. I'm a 36DDD and got the XXL. I'm technically between XL and XXL on the chart, but the last thing I got from this company in XL was far too small in the chest, so I went up. It fits the bust comfortably, but it's a bit big in the waist, with no way to address that without tailoring. If I went down a size, the bust would be WAY too small.  Do note that the bottom is entirely open below the buttons, as in there are two flaps that just meet, don't attach to each other. That's not going to be an issue for me, but it's not screamingly clear from the photos.  I got the black dot, and it's pretty see-through. Again, not an issue for me and my well-matched nude bra (NOT WHITE), but you can definitely see the tag on the side through the fabric, as in see the outline and the printing (not readably but as dark splotches) through the fabric. The fabric is also okay but not great. I'm not anti-synthetic and there are some GREAT ones out there. This isn't the greatest, but it's also not the worst, either. It's reasonably soft.
